revised_title: Oxidation of Aniline and Formation of Complex Molecules by Peroxidase
tldr: The authors studied the enzymatic oxidation of aniline using peroxidase and found that it produces a complex mixture of related substances, including 2:5-dianilino-p-benzoquinone imide-anil, induline, pseudo-mauveine, and ungreenable aniline black. The study provides insights into the role of peroxidase in metabolic processes and the synthesis of biologically important compounds.
